umm.. yeah, clerics are perfect. i think soldiers should have a more 
impressive ability than disarm on lvl. 10 though. the druid needs the 
most work.also, elves need some variety in their abilities. i mean, 
come on! rocks, bouncing rocks, more rocks, mega rocks?

dual classing idea:
at level 4, any guy can dual-class with another class, if you can, 
like no soldier/clerics... instead, that would be a separate class 
called a paladin, but anyway, after they changed, they would have to 
get to level 4 before being able to use any of the first classes' 
abilities... then they would level up as normal, but half as fast 
(takes twice as much exp to get to next level, etc.) learning two 
abilities on lvl.10 and lvl.7
